experiences: Worked on a **CRM-based Class Management System**, contributing to both backend and front-end development.
Developed and maintained backend functionality using **Spring Boot Java** and **JDBC** for database connectivity.
Implemented **CRUD operations** for managing student and class data within the CRM system.
Worked with **MySQL databases**, creating and optimizing queries for data retrieval and storage.
Assisted in the creation of **APIs** using **Spring Boot** for efficient data handling and integration.
Performed **backend debugging** and resolved issues related to database queries and API responses.
Worked on **front-end debugging** with **JavaScript** and **SAP Fiori**, improving user experience.
Created and updated **technical documentation** for the CRM project, ensuring clear guidelines for future development.
